activities: Submit visa applications to consulates.  We will have a person's passport along with an application that contains his or her personal info.  If need be, we will scan the documents prior to submission and will store them on our private services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: We will have copies of passports and applications that we will store on our private servers
